titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Essex National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
A bill to reauthorize the Essex National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
This bill reauthorizes through FY2036 grants and any other assistance for the Essex National Heritage Area in Massachusetts.
The bill removes the limit on the total amount that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
